com.openclassrooms.safetynet.service.person

Interface PersonManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PersonManagerImpl

    public interface PersonManager
    The interface Person manager.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addPerson(Person person)
      Used to add a new person(firstName and lastName cannot be non-existent)
      void deletePerson(Person person)
      Method used to delete a person(to find the person to update, this method use firstName + lastName)
      java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getAllMailsByCity(java.lang.String city)
      This method is used to get all mails of persons using city for parameter
      ChildListAndFamilyListDto getChildrenByAddress(java.lang.String address)
      Method used to get all children by address and their family, and the number of child and number of adults
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<FamiliesByStationDto>> getPersonsByAddressStationForFloodAlert(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> stations)
      This method using firestation number return persons by addresses
      java.util.List<PersonByFirstNameAndLastNameDto> getPersonsByFirstNameAndLastName(java.lang.String firstName, java.lang.String lastName)
      Method used to return a list of persons using firstName and lastName
      void updatePerson(Person person)
      Method used to update a person(to find the person to update, this method use firstName + lastName)

    • Method Detail

      • addPerson

        void addPerson(Person person)
        Used to add a new person(firstName and lastName cannot be non-existent)
        Parameters:
        person - is defined by a firstName and a lastName

      • updatePerson

        void updatePerson(Person person)
        Method used to update a person(to find the person to update, this method use firstName + lastName)
        Parameters:
        person - is defined by a firstName and a lastName

      • deletePerson

        void deletePerson(Person person)
        Method used to delete a person(to find the person to update, this method use firstName + lastName)
        Parameters:
        person - is defined by a firstName and a lastName

      • getAllMailsByCity

        java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getAllMailsByCity(java.lang.String city)
        This method is used to get all mails of persons using city for parameter
        Parameters:
        city - is used to filter persons
        Returns:
        a list of mails without duplicate for city in parameter

      • getPersonsByFirstNameAndLastName

        java.util.List<PersonByFirstNameAndLastNameDto> getPersonsByFirstNameAndLastName(java.lang.String firstName,
                                                                                 java.lang.String lastName)
        Method used to return a list of persons using firstName and lastName
        Parameters:
        firstName - is used like identifier
        lastName - is used like identifier
        Returns:
        using firstName and lastName in parameters, the person with the same firstName and lastName, and a list of persons with the same lastName. return for each person : firstName, lastName, email, age, list of medications and list of allergies

      • getPersonsByAddressStationForFloodAlert

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<FamiliesByStationDto>> getPersonsByAddressStationForFloodAlert(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> stations)
        This method using firestation number return persons by addresses
        Parameters:
        stations - define the number of the firestation, one or more stations can be used
        Returns:
        This method return a map of persons by address for flood alert return by address list of persons with their firstName, lastName, phone, age, list of medications and list of allergies

      • getChildrenByAddress

        ChildListAndFamilyListDto getChildrenByAddress(java.lang.String address)
        Method used to get all children by address and their family, and the number of child and number of adults
        Parameters:
        address - used to filter persons
        Returns:
        a list of child with firstName, lastName, phone and age and a list of Adults with same description
